entry.title: https://github.com/feenkcom/gtoolkit
entry.content: Glamorous Toolkit is the Moldable Development environment. It empowers you to make systems explainable through experiences tailored for each problem.

entry.title: https://github.com/pharo-project/pharo
entry.content: Pharo is a dynamic reflective pure object-oriented language supporting live programming inspired by Smalltalk.
